VoterInfo.title: VoterInfo
VoterInfo.description: Stores information about individual voters collected via the contact form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the VoterInfo entity.

additionalInfo.description: Any additional information provided by the voter.

definition.description: Stores information about individual voters. VoterInfo documents are identified by a unique ID.

params.name: voterInfoId
params.description: The unique identifier for each voter's information.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to store voter information collected through a contact form and displayed on an interactive map. A top-level collection, `voterInfo`, stores the `VoterInfo` entities. This design promotes data clarity and enables simple querying. Since no user authentication beyond anonymous is required based on the prompt, all data is stored in a single top-level collection.  The structure facilitates authorization independence as all information required to decide authorization is contained within each document. QAPs are supported because all documents within the `voterInfo` collection share the same security requirements, thus fulfilling structural segregation.
